H0.text: Flourine, Bromine, Iodine and Chlorine are all what type of elements. Halogen

H1.text: Flourine, Bromine, Iodine and Chlorine are all what type of elements. Noble Gas

H2.text: Flourine, Bromine, Iodine and Chlorine are all what type of elements. Metalloid

H3.text: Flourine, Bromine, Iodine and Chlorine are all what type of elements. Dihalo

A4.text: The halogens fluorine, chlorine, bromine, and iodine are a group in the periodic table consisting of six chemically related elements: fluorine (F), chlorine (Cl), bromine (Br), iodine (I), and the radioactive elements astatine (At) and tennessine (Ts).

A5.text: The halogens fluorine, chlorine, bromine, and iodine are nonmetals; they belong to group 17.
